snippet.title: WRC 7 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.teamvvv.com/ presents the announcement trailer for WRC 7, coming to PS4, Xbox One and PC this Autumn.

More details found here - http://www.teamvvv.com/en/news/comments/WRC-7-confirmed-to-release-this-Autumn-new-trailer

Subscribe to Team VVV http://goo.gl/0jzeJT
Team VVV Merchandise https://shop.spreadshirt.co.uk/TeamVVV
Join the Team VVV Newletter and Competitions: http://www.teamvvv.com/en/Newsletter
Join Team VVV: http://www.teamvvv.com/en/news/comments/Expanding-The-Team-Opportunities-at-Team-VVV
